platform.title: EWAS-Galaxy
platform.summary: Galaxy Docker image for population epigenetics data analysis
comments: Epigenome-wide association studies (EWAS) analyse genome-wide activity of epigenetic marks in cohorts of different individuals to find associations between epigenetic variation and phenotype.
citations: [EWAS-Galaxy: a tools suite for population epigenetics integrated into Galaxy](https://doi.org/10.1101/553784 ), Katarzyna Murat, [Björn Grüning](/src/people/bjoern-gruening/index.md), Paulina Wiktoria Poterlowicz, Gillian Westgate, Desmond J Tobin, Krzysztof Poterlowicz. *bioRxiv* 553784; doi:doi.org/10.1101/553784
